name: Navigating the Realms: A 3D Movement Experience (WebGPU)
name_original: Navigating the Realms: A 3D Movement Experience (WebGPU)
description: Embark on a journey through a beautifully rendered 3D world, powered by WebGPU. Explore a landscape of mesmerizing triangles and discover the beauty of motion. Use your keyboard to navigate through the world, using the WASD keys to move and the LShift key to speed up. Experience the thrill of movement in a fully immersive 3D environment, and witness the power of WebGPU to bring your world to life. Join the revolution and immerse yourself in a world of endless possibilities. Get ready to explore the art of movement like never before.
